attributes.action: Not to change duty on alcohol due to irresponsible drinkers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority of drinkers are sensible drinkers and should not have to pay a stealth tax for people that cost taxpayers money for behaving badly. People that are arrested for drunken behaviour should be fined to cover the cost of the police and courts, not the innocent.
